alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 05 at 3:32PM AKDT until September 07 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 10 PM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 10 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will wash away. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusting to 40 mph will develop Wednesday and continue into Thursday. These winds will cause high surf to develop Wednesday. The highest surf will be along northwest facing shores such as near Kotzebue. Winds and surf will continue into Thursday and decrease thursday night.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
